    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAuthorizedUser()
      addAuthorizedUser is a method that asks for the necessary information to add a new authorized user to a restricted playlist.
      void addSongToPlaylist()
      addSongToPlaylist is a method that asks for the necessary information to add an existent song to a playlist.
      void createPrivatePlaylist()
      createPrivatePlaylist is a method that asks for the necessary information to create a private playlist, it validates space available to save it, accurate inputs and the existence of the authorized user
      void createPublicPlaylist()
      createPublicPlaylist is a method that asks for the necessary information to create a public playlist, it validates space available to save it and accurate inputs
      void createRestrictedPlaylist()
      createPrivatePlaylist is a method that asks for the necessary information to create a restricted playlist, it validates space available to save it, accurate inputs and the existence of the main authorized user
      void createSong()
      createSong is a method that asks for the necessary information to add a new song, it validates space available to save it and accurate inputs
      void createUser()
      createUser is a method that asks for the necessary information to add a new user, it validates space available to save it and accurate inputs

      executeOperation is a method that executes the function according to the main menu
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void rankPublicPlaylist()
      rankPublicPlaylist is a method that asks for the necessary information to rank a public playlist It validates accurate inputs and the existence of the playlist
      int showMenu()
      showMenu is a method that shows the main menu for the application with the main functions

        public void addAuthorizedUser()

      • addSongToPlaylist

        public void addSongToPlaylist()
        addSongToPlaylist is a method that asks for the necessary information to add an existent song to a playlist. It works for the three types of playlist. It validates information according to the type
